docs.title: POST

docs.text: Data Models This page contains all the data models used in the API. HTTPValidationError Schema: { "detail": [ValidationError] // } Properties: detail : [ValidationError] NewEndpointRequest Schema: { "name": string (required) // The name to include in the message. } Properties: name (required) : string Description: The name to include in the message. Example: developer NewEndpointResponse Schema: { "message": string (required) // A welcome message. } Properties: message (required) : string Description: A welcome message. Example: Hello, world! ValidationError Schema: { "loc": [unknown] (required) // "msg": string (required) // "type": string (required) // } Properties: loc (required) : [unknown] msg (required) : string type (required) : string
